snippet: With the default rate steadily rising among the nation’s 36 million student loan borrowers, President Obama is seeking to ease the repayment process by streamlining enrollment in the income-based repayment program.
abstract: Pres Obama will seek to ease the repayment process of student loans for the nation's 36 million student borrowers by streamlining enrollment in the income-based repayment program, which caps monthly payments for low-income borrowers; rate of student loan default has been steadily climbing.
lead_paragraph: With the default rate steadily rising among the nation’s 36 million student loan borrowers, President Obama is seeking to ease the repayment process by streamlining enrollment in the income-based repayment program.
